items.title: On the colour of perovskites
items.excerpt: There is something deeply satisfying about a material that glows. Not the glow of a screen or a bulb, but the glow of something that has absorbed light and decided, in its own time, to give it back.

items.title: What the lab teaches you about patience
items.excerpt: A synthesis that takes eight hours teaches you something that no book can. You learn to wait without anxiety. You learn that the outcome is not entirely yours to control.
